name: global-ls-account-ratio
description: Fetches global long/short account ratio from Binance futures. This metric shows the proportion of accounts with long vs short positions across all users. Output includes: long/short account ratio, percentage of accounts with long positions, and percentage with short positions. Useful for gauging overall market sentiment and trader positioning bias. A ratio > 1 indicates more long accounts than short accounts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve (max 500)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch
